newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - July 29.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - July 29.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Defence minister Prince Sultan says Saudi Arabia, France support peace in the Middle East.
- Philippine trade fair to be held in the Saudi city of Dhahran next month.
- National Commercial Bank announces first half profits of 590.3 million riyals.
- Saudi interior minister sends message to his Yemeni counterpart on security agreement and border dispute between the two countries.
- Crown Prince Abdullah lays the foundation stone of King Abdul Aziz Medical Centre in Jeddah on Tuesday.
- A 17 million riyal commercial complex for women opened in Saudi Arabia.
- Saudi stocks end last week's trading higher, index grew to 171 points.
